channel.title: Need help with 508
channel.description:
i try to run my 508 server and this comes up
"the system cannot find the path specified... press any key to continue"
i've been looking for tuts but rune-server is down atm and if u know how to help that would be great
thanks

item.title: Need help with 508
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

OK ill try to explain why it isn’t working for you.

If you right click the .bat file or the run file, hit edit.
Next the line where it has your jdk path listed you need to change that to where YOUR jdk is.
If you know where your jdk path is then just put that in, but if you don’t know ill tell you the MOST likely way to fix it without editing the .bat

Head over to this url: https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jre-6u10-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer
That is the latest jdk download which is most likely what you need to download to fix your little problem.

After you download that and if it still doesn’t work then check your .bat file for this line:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\java.exe" It should like that after you have downloaded the new jdk.

But if you already know where you jdk is then use the above:

If you know where your jdk path is then just put that in, but if you don’t know ill tell you the MOST likely way to fix it without editing the .bat

Read full topic
